title: Pyruvic acid vertabrate muscle cell, 5 options 1

content.question: The rate of pyruvic acid formation fluctuates because

choices.label: all enzymes have been used up
the reaction is accelerated by positive feedback
the reaction is affected by negative feedback

content.answer: the reaction is affected by negative feedback

skill.text: 6.D: Explain the relationship between experimental results and larger biological concepts, processes, or theories.
